name: Kiss Him, Not Me: Can She Do It? A Real Life Otome Game
short_description: "I love seeing guys get along more than anything!" Serinuma Kae is a second year high school student who's always entertaining such wild thoughts and pairing boys up everywhere. Everyday, she enjoys discussing her fujoshi flavored fantasies with her like-minded friend, A-chan.

English*, Japanese
